scenario_text.value:
Urrrgh... A, Aoi... Have to...protect...
Aoi...

It appears Labramon’s wound is worse than we
realized. We must treat her at once...

They’d better bring back that first-aid kit
soon. Labramon’s looking pretty rough...

Plus this building’s giving me the creeps...
The walls look kinda, I dunno...sticky?

I don’t see anything around here that’d make
things get all gooey, do you, Takuma?

(He’s right, there’s nothing on the walls.
Maybe that’ll change if I use my camera...?)
Shee-hee-hee-hee...
Hmm? You say something, man?
Me? No, I didn’t say anything.
Huh, guess I was imagining things...

Me and Falcomon’ll look after things here.
You and Aoi go on together!
Oh, you found a first-aid kit!

Good going! C’mon, let’s take care of
Labramon right away!
Yeah!
Hurry up and <color=#B41919>help Labramon</color>, chop chop!

Me and Falcomon’ll look after things here.
You and Aoi go on together!
You’d better hustle!
Leave things here to us!
(Okay, I’ll check this spot with my camera!)
Ah, hey! Hold on, Takuma!

I know I’m the one that brought it up, but
you should focus on the first-aid kit now!
Let’s try it AFTER we’ve helped Labramon!
Yeah, you’re right.

Good call, Minoru. I’ll bring it back in
a jiffy!
Oh, you found a first-aid kit!

Good going! C’mon, let’s take care of
Labramon right away!
Yeah!
Hurry up and <color=#B41919>help Labramon</color>, chop chop!
